data.name: School-CRM
data.description: Welcome to the School CRM System project! This system is designed to provide a smooth and intuitive experience for parents, students, and staff, focusing on student management and engagement. With our CRM, schools can enhance communication, ensure timely updates, and foster a better learning environment.

data.name: diabetes-predictor
data.description: A powerful machine learning application that provides real-time diabetes risk assessments using state-of-the-art predictive models. Designed to educate, detect early symptoms, and help users take preventive steps toward a healthier life.

data.name: androidApp
data.description: An AI-powered web tool to analyze Android APKs and generate detailed security insights. Upload APK files and get a clear breakdown of permissions, vulnerabilities, and more â€” all from a sleek frontend.

data.name: donations
data.description: A beautifully designed Donations platform that allows users to contribute to causes that matter. The app is clean, responsive, and optimized for a seamless giving experience.

data.name: Travel
data.description: An elegant and user-friendly travel website designed to inspire and assist users in exploring beautiful destinations. It offers a smooth browsing experience, engaging visuals, and modern responsive UI

data.name: online-voting-portal
data.description: A secure, modern, and user-friendly online voting system built with Next.js 14, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS. This platform enables secure electronic voting with features like photo verification, real-time results, and comprehensive admin controls.
